entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023
